data.taskTitle: Add toast notifications for project save/delete actions
Add toast notifications for project save/delete actions
data.approach: Will add toast notifications to 3 locations: (1) ProjectEditor.svelte handleSave and handleDelete functions, (2) configStore.svelte.ts saveProject, toggleProjectVisibility functions. Will import successToast/errorToast from existing toasts store.

summary: Added success toast notifications for project create and update operations
Added error toast notifications on save failures with detailed error messages

suggestedTasks.title: Add toast notifications for command save/delete operations
suggestedTasks.description: Similar to project toasts - add success/error feedback when slash commands are created, updated, or deleted in the config page
suggestedTasks.reason: Consistency - commands should have the same feedback pattern as projects

suggestedTasks.title: Add toast notifications for hooks save/delete operations
suggestedTasks.description: Add success/error feedback when hooks are created, updated, or deleted in the hooks configuration section
suggestedTasks.reason: Consistency - all config sections should have toast feedback

patterns: Use successToast(title, details) for success notifications
Use errorToast(title, details) for error notifications
Wrap async operations in try/catch for error handling
